## Branding interface

A type definition for custom branding configurations from yml file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Branding 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [applicationTitle?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.applicationtitle.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Application title that will replace the default opensearch dashboard string |
|  [assetFolderUrl?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.assetfolderurl.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Relative path to the asset folder |
|  [darkMode?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.darkmode.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Default mode or Dark mode |
|  [faviconUrl?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.faviconurl.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom favicon that will be rendered on the browser tab |
|  [loadingLogo?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.loadinglogo.md) | { defaultUrl?: string; darkModeUrl?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Loading logo that will be rendered on the loading page |
|  [logo?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.logo.md) | { defaultUrl?: string; darkModeUrl?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Fuller logo that will be rendered on nav bar header |
|  [mark?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.mark.md) | { defaultUrl?: string; darkModeUrl?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Small logo icon that will be used in most logo occurrences |
|  [useExpandedHeader?](./opensearch-dashboards.branding.useexpandedheader.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to use expanded menu (true) or condensed menu (false) |
